tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    bio TEXT,
    date_joined TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AccessPermissions (
    permission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    permission_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    granted BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE KnowledgeBaseArticles (
    article_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    author_id UUID,
    date_created TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ArticleComments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id UUID NOT NULL,
    commenter_id UUID NOT NULL,
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    date_posted TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeBaseArticles(article_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (commenter_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE knowledge_base (
	article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	content TEXT NOT NULL,
	created_date DATE,
	author_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE article_tags (
	article_id INT NOT NULL,
	tag_id INT NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY (article_id, tag_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES knowledge_base(article_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags(tag_id)
);
